```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/4. SEMESTER/Eye-tracking")
library(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("samples.csv")

#calculate length of a vector


a <- -9
b <- 0

#LOOP 

pos_x_a <- df[a + 10,4]
pos_x_b <- df[b + 10,4]

pos_y_a <- df[a + 10,5]
pos_y_b <- df[b + 10,5]

vector_1 <- c(pos_x_a-pos_x_b, pos_y_a-pos_y_b) 

vector_1
```
